short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clikez, is an extension to help you create easy demos/tutorials using screenshots and clicks :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clikez is a chrome extension help make demos and tutorials faster, by simple screenshots and clicks you can get your demos up and running.

 When you start the extension, it will take screen shot of your active tab and record each click position, 
 once you finish then you can easily get a demo of showing screen shots and clicks position providing you with interactive demos to share with others.
